notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acscentsci.9b00202.
Field-dependence of ρ
xx for various temperatures for sample 2; magnetoresistance at the same temperatures for sample 2; first Brillouin zone of the rhombohedral lattice with the high symmetry momentum points marked (Γ–M–K) ( PDF)
